content: Sportsbet's Bitcointalk World Cup 2022 discussionThe general summary of all the rules can be found in this thread.A short overview is as follows:Cro2 team (Trofo & cryptofrka) will be hosting Bitcointalk's World Cup sponsored by industry leader Sportsbet32 players will be divided into 8 groups – we'll be using the same system as in the actual World CupThe points will be collected by answering a questionnaire (to be filled in Google forms before every round)It will consist of 10 questions per round that will require some football knowledge to answerTotal prize pool will be 3500$ in BTC The timeline is the same as in the actual World Cup – with competition lasting until the WC finalThere will be 7 rounds in total (3 in the group stages, 1 for R16, QF, SF and final/3rd place)To participate in the round, the player has to play a 0,5 mBTC ticket on Sportsbet before the start of that round. Rank Member and higher can participate, with Trofo and cryptofrka excluded from the competitionThe registration will be on a FCFS principle, if we will have more than 32 players we will keep them in reserve in case that some people fail to participate in the 1st round. After the 1st round is complete, the registrations will be fully closedPlease familiarize yourselves with all the rules in the following thread, this is just a short summary.It’s time to brush up on your football knowledge, the World Cup is less than 3 weeks away!

That is the official one and this one is for discussing things as the name suggests.
